```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(lubridate)
library(bizdays)
```

# Finding #1

# Finding #2
```{r}
# Find the big age group
bank %>% 
  group_by(age_group = (age %/% 10) * 10) %>%
  summarise(count = n()) %>%
  arrange(age_group) -> res

res

plot(res$age_group, res$count)
```
